---
title: HCL-32 vs MAST
url: "/compare-harmonise-instruments/hcl-32-vs-mast/"
date: 2025-01-15
---

## HCL-32 vs MAST

Comparing two extensive psychological questionnaires like the Hypomania Checklist-32 (HCL-32) and the Michigan Alcoholism Screening Test (MAST) can be a daunting task. This process, termed as harmonisation, is integral to the field but can be time-consuming, subjective, and complex. This is where Harmony, an innovative software developed for psychologists, comes into play. It is built to help streamline the task of comparing such instruments, and can greatly facilitate the process of HCL-32 vs MAST.

## Compare the items in HCL-32 and MAST

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#/import/W3siaW5zdHJ1bWVudF9uYW1lIjogIkh5cG9tYW5pYSBDaGVja2xpc3QtMzIgKEhDTC0zMikiLCAicXVlc3Rpb25zIjogW3sicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgYXJlIHlvdSBmZWVsaW5nIHRvZGF5IGNvbXBhcmVkIHRvIHlvdXIgdXN1YWwgc3RhdGU__In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJhLiBGYW1pbHkgbGlmZSJ9LCB7InF1ZXN0aW9uX3RleHQiOiAiYi4gU29jaWFsIGxpZmUifSwgeyJxdWVzdGlvbl90ZXh0IjogImMuIFdvcmsifSwgeyJxdWVzdGlvbl90ZXh0IjogImQuIExlaXN1cmUifSwgeyJxdWVzdGlvbl90ZXh0IjogIkhvdyBkbyBwZW9wbGUgY2xvc2UgdG8geW91IHJlYWN0IHRvIG9yIGNvbW1lbnQgb24geW91ciBcImhpZ2hzXCI_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJMZW5ndGggb2YgeW91ciBcImhpZ2hzXCIgYXMgYSBydWxlIChvbiBhdmVyYWdlKToifSwgeyJxdWVzdGlvbl90ZXh0IjogIkhhdmUgeW91IGV4cGVyaWVuY2VkIHN1Y2ggXCJoaWdoc1wiIGluIHRoZSBwYXN0IHR3ZWx2ZSBtb250aHM___In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJEbyBmcmllbmRzIG9yIHJlbGF0aXZlcyB0aGluayB5b3UgYXJlIGEgbm9ybWFsIGRyaW5rZXI__In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIYXZlIHlvdSBldmVyIG5lZ2xlY3RlZCB5b3VyIG9ibGlnYXRpb25zLCB5b3VyIGZhbWlseSwgb3IgeW91ciB3b3JrIGZvciB0d28gb3IgbW9yZSBkYXlzIGluIGEgcm93IGJlY2F1c2UgeW91IHdlcmUgZHJpbmtpbmc__In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIYXZlIHlvdSBldmVyIGdvbmUgdG8gYW55b25lIGZvciBoZWxwIGFib3V0IHlvdXIgZHJpbmtpbmc___" target="harmonyapp">Import just MAST into Harmony</a> - compare MAST with other instruments

 With Harmony, researchers get to leverage the power of natural language processing and generative AI models. This facilitates swift and accurate harmonisation of questionnaire items, across various languages, making HCL-32 vs MAST a less arduous task. These comparisons provide researchers the ability to test whether results are consistent across studies, or if they differ in response to changing social conditions. Harmony allows for the selection of instruments from its database, or lets you input your own in PDF form. 


{{< image src="images/gad7-becks.jpg" alt="dog" title="dog" >}}

{{< card heading="Try Harmony" copy="Compare HCL-32 and MAST " url="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app" >}}

{{< youtube cEZppTBj1NI >}}


Making the process user-friendly and efficient. We encourage researchers conducting psychological and social studies to explore the use of Harmony for comparing HCL-32 vs MAST. Beyond saving valuable time and effort, the utilization of Harmony enhances accuracy and allows for consistent harmonisation even across multiple languages. The future of psychological testing and comparisons lies within integrating such contemporary tools into research methodology, and Harmony stands out as an excellent example of this path forwards.
